import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; function Create(){ const [values, setValues] = useState({ title: '', amountCollected: '', totalVolumes: '' }) const handleSubmit = (e)=> { e.preventDefault() axios.post('http://localhost:8081/book', values) .then(res =>console.log(res)) .catch(err => console.log.apply(err)) } return(

setValues({...values, title: e.target.value})}/>
setValues({...values, amountCollected: e.target.value})}/>
setValues({...values, totalVolumes: e.target.value})}/>
) } export default Create
